flawed_nl_solution:
He needs 160 ice cubes because 10 / (1/16) = <<10/(1/16)=160>>160
It will take him 16 hours because 160 / 10 = <<160/10=16>>16
His ice maker will cost $24 to run because 16 x 1.5 = <<16*1.5=24>>24
He will need 320 ounce of water because 160 x 2 = <<160*2=320>>320
This will cost him $32 because 320 x 0.1 = <<320*0.1=32>>32
It will cost in total $57 to make all the ice because 24 + 32 = <<24+32=57>>57
#### 57

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 56, not 57. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
